text: Determines how much $SCRAP is added to your Stash every few seconds.

Thanks to blockchain and the economic system, all game assets are stored on the platform, enabling dynamic trading and resource exchange. Social experience: Interact with other players, exchange experiences and resources, create alliances, and compete for the pinnacle of Hell.
